item.title: Validate GitLab Repository Configuration With Semgrep
item.description: Imagine this: You are migrating 50+ Repositories to a new GitLab instance. In addition to changing CI from Jenkins to GitLab CI, you are also trying to enforce a certain set of best practices like “don’t allow people to force-push the main branch”. And since those practices are new, they might change a few times before settling. How do you ensure that after multiple months of migration, all repositories are in a similar state?
